page.title: 19Mortimer Children's Pastimes
page.content: My favourite toy:-"I got my best toy the day after I was born. When I was old enough I named it panda because it was a panda. I hold him with my left hand while I suck my thumb with my right hand and smell his ear. He is very, very dirty and his head will soon come off. He got so thin Mummy had to knit him a jumper so he wouldn't fall apart. He used to be furry but the fur fell off. He is in lots of Dads photo albums. I take him to bed every night. He was the first toy I ever got." Many children have large collections of tin badges, often with slogans:- 'Mrs. X rules O.K.' or place names:- 'Bekonscot Model Village',or T.V. characters,e.g. Bugs Bunny. Key rings and novelty erasers are also popular collectors' items.
